command_list.command: execute as @e[type=player,distance=..20] at @s run playsound minecraft:msabyss record @p ~ ~ ~ 0.9

hit_command_list.command: execute as @p at @p run playsound epicfight:entity.hit.blade_rush_last master @s ~ ~ ~ 0.8
execute as @p at @p run particle epicfight:blade_rush ~ ~1 ~ 0 0 0 1 1

execute unless entity @s[tag=fatal_draw_able] run indestructible @s set_phase 1
